responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "9A5CCBBF4E6A7BCE3B43AEBAB96A2596", "Exercise caution when traversing Verra under the cover of night. The Greyshore Transporters don\'t shy away from peril, but even our seasoned crews know that the shadows of this land are not to be taken lightly. Stay sharp and watch for the Court of Cloaks ... they\'re always lurking.")
name: DD_CSQ_0050_CaravanAssistant_20
